title: FT/FS: Lucky Wright EPDG SGC 40 - SOLD

posts.post_title: FT/FS: Lucky Wright EPDG SGC 40 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Howdy folks.....

I still have this Lucky Wright EPDG card that is available for sale or trade. Sorry about the crappy scan.....best I can do with SGC cards.

Asking $SOLD shipped. If that is too much, feel free to make an offer.  Also willing to trade for comparable EPDG I do not have (see image below Wright).  Also willing to trade for whatever you might have that I need.

Open to anything......just don't want this extra Wright hanging around when someone else can appreciate him.  ;)
Bump.  Wright and McQuillan still available.....tell me what you got!
Using old EPDG thread.  Wright for sale
